mapper.select: SELECT scene.id AS scene_id, scene.name AS scene_name, scene.icon AS scene_icon, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY common_scene.create_time ASC) AS scene_index FROM family_common_scene AS common_scene LEFT JOIN family_scene AS scene ON scene.id = common_scene.scene_id WHERE common_scene.family_id = #{familyId}
